Title: Animal Control
Plot: Leslie decides to give the Animal Control Department a much-needed makeover. Ann tries to get Ron the medical attention he needs. Ben, Tom, and Andy recruit donors for their charity foundation.
GuestStars: Jason Mantzoukas, Jon Glaser, James Greene, Kevin Symons, Cooper Thornton, Yvans Jourdain, Harris Wittels, Colton Dunn, Eric Isenhower, Donick Cary, Katie Dippold, Timothy Hornor
